ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // “Oh man,
My future in the military
is pretty bleak.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:3}); // “Geez! Do you think this is
what they call 'hazing?'”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // “And I can't find the uniform
I left in my locker, either.
I wonder where I forgot it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:1}); // “Hey, how could they do that!?
Nobody woke me up!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // “I'm starting to feel like
I can't stop anymore.”{PAUSE}“I've been had!!
I want to get in a real battle, too!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “Ever since I was late to that parade,
they've been on my back everyday
with basic training.”{PAUSE}“I can't handle it anymore!”
Bank[6][17] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:11}); // “Hmmm?
Back again, Mr. Know-it-all!?”{PAUSE}“All right!
You can enter!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // “Hmmm?
You have no right to enter!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // “Hmm?
A know-it-all, huh?”{PAUSE}“All right!!
Come in!!”

dialogStrings:
“Hey, how could they do that!?
Nobody woke me up!”

“And I can't find the uniform
I left in my locker, either.
I wonder where I forgot it?”

“Geez! Do you think this is
what they call 'hazing?'”

“Oh man,
My future in the military
is pretty bleak.”

“Ever since I was late to that parade,
they've been on my back everyday
with basic training.”{PAUSE}“I can't handle it anymore!”

“Hmm?
A know-it-all, huh?”{PAUSE}“All right!!
Come in!!”

“Hmmm?
No rookies!!”{PAUSE}“Only veterans can go through!
Come back when you've grown up.”

“Hmmm?
You have no right to enter!”

“Hmmm?
Back again, Mr. Know-it-all!?”{PAUSE}“All right!
You can enter!!”

“I'm starting to feel like
I can't stop anymore.”{PAUSE}“I've been had!!
I want to get in a real battle, too!”
